title: The Great Sailing Vessel
provenance_text:
Antonio Corpora [1909-2004], Rome, Italy, until November 1952; G. David Thompson [1899-1965], Pittsburgh, PA, November 1952 until April 1953 [2]; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1953.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 52 in "The 1952 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Paintings" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1952.
[2]. Mr. Thompson purchased the painting from the International for $300 as an intended gift for Carnegie Institute. Acknowledgement of his payment to the artist was made by the Institute's Italian representative on November 17, 1952 (see curatorial file for relevant correspondence.) The painting was accessioned by the museum on April 27, 1953.
